name: Twostream for Chrome
description: 動画でコミュニケーション
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://twostream-web-production.firebaseapp.com;script-src 'self' https://apis.google.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://www.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com https://*.twostream.net https://twostream.net https://twostream-raw-video-private-production.s3.amazonaws.com https://twostream-raw-video-private-production.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com
